very low.note: Keep this on a daily driver device but back it up to another vault once a month.

low.note: Pair a local hot wallet with a hardware wallet; refresh the backup quarterly.

moderate.note: Spread shards across a hardware wallet, a trusted friend, and an air-gapped laptop.

medium.note: Use a hardware wallet plus a safety deposit box; avoid keeping copies on the same network.

high.note: Only keep one shard on any single device; treat every copy as a highly sensitive key.
